item.title: PHP autoload
item.description: php autoload In general, when we use a file which not include in current file, we need to load it in current file by using require or include; But when a project has a lot of php files, it is not a good way to include each file manually. Let’s see a simple code: <?php $person = new Person("Rhys", 20); var_dump($person); There is a new class Person which didn’t be

item.title: Echo set color
item.description: Echo set color 先看例子：echo -e "\033[32m Hello world \033[0m" 会输出 $echo -e "\033[32m Hello world \033[0m" Hello world # 绿色的文字 其中： -e表示解析逃逸字符（Escape character），逃逸字符为
